alert.note: Alert for Delaware (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 8:28PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Delaware County through 915 PM EDT... At 828 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Deposit, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Beerston, Cannonsville, Rock Rift and Hale Eddy. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 86/Route 17 near 90. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
